actions.description: The tower hand makes two Unarmed Strike attacks, two Dart attacks, or one of each.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Unarmed Strike

actions.description: 4 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Dart

specialTraits.description: While the tower hand is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.
specialTraits.name: Unarmored Defense
